title: Downloading LoL
body: LoL was accidently deleted off my computer however Logs and Config were untouched. Is there someway to use these to speed up the download process when i relaunch the launcher to download the game?

replies.body: Can I speed up the installation in any way?

Logs and config files are supplemental and won't really do anything as far as installation goes.  The patcher will want to setup a fresh install for you anyway, and replace anything old or bad.  Let me know if that clears things up!
